thread.title: Wealth Management Boutique A.W. Jones Private Advisors Expands with Addition of Eric B. Ingber

author: cnbc.com
title: Wealth Management Boutique A.W. Jones Private Advisors Expands with Addition of Eric B. Ingber
text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- A.W. Jones Private Advisors , a boutique investment advisor that offers wealth management services with a specialization in alternative investments, today announced the addition of Eric B. Ingber as Managing Director, Wealth Advisor. Ingber is based at A.W. Jones’ headquarters in New York City.
Ingber joins A.W. Jones following a successful 18-year career at JP Morgan, where he served as an Executive Director. His primary responsibilities at JP Morgan included client portfolio management, lending, client relations, and the design and implementation of client investment programs.
In a statement Ingber said, “Over the years I have evaluated numerous firms in a search to identify one that truly understood me, and more importantly, my client’s distinct needs and goals. I strongly believe that A.W. Jones Private Advisors is that firm. Built upon a powerful family legacy, A.W. Jones Private Advisors has a unique culture, modern capabilities and an exceptional team with an unwavering commitment to accelerate success for every client. It’s truly an honor to join them.”
Thomas J. Haug, President, said, “We are delighted to have found such a high-caliber individual to join our firm. Eric is a valuable addition to the A.W. Jones’ culture, which we value immensely. Being a fiduciary is front and center in everything we do and the addition of Eric helps serve that strong fiduciary commitment. We look forward to continued firm growth and the quality service we provide our clients.”
A.W. Jones Private Advisors is a boutique investment advisor that offers wealth management services on an open-architecture investment platform with a specialization in alternative investments. A.W. Jones Private Advisors’ independent, multi-asset class investment approach provides access to traditional equity, fixed income, hedge fund, private equity and real-estate strategies, where large firms may be constrained because of their size and business models. The firm utilizes in-house investment research to source unique, highly-specialized investment managers to design and implement customized investment solutions. Account aggregation and performance reporting technologies provide the firm’s clients and advisors with holistic portfolio analysis.
About A.W. Jones
A.W. Jones was founded in 1949 by Alfred Winslow Jones – a pioneer in sophisticated, risk-adjusted investing – as the first hedge fund. The firm evolved into one of the earliest multi-manager funds. Most recently, A.W. Jones Private Advisors was established to serve the wealth management needs of high-net-worth individuals, family offices, endowments and foundations. For more information, visit www.awjones.com
